svg.text: 1-configur OSPF in AS-2 & EIGRP in AS-3 2-configure eBGP in R1--R11 , R2--R11 R3--R13 , R6--R11 , R7 -- R13 3- Create loop-back 0 in R13 , R10 4- configure eBGP between loopback interface in R13 , R10 5- Configure authentication for iBGP between R6,R7,R8,R9 6- configure description for eBGP 7-configure static NAT in R1 , R10 8- Advertise Assigned public IPs in R11 , R13 9-Advertise Default-Route in AS-2 , AS-3 10 -configure iBGP in AS-2 , AS-3 in AS-3 ---> use templet 11- Advertise Assigned public IPs in R2 , R3 ,R6 , R7 12- configure WEIGHT in R4 to select R3 for all internet 13- configure WEIGHT in R5 to select R3 for 80.80.80.80/32 14- configure R6 to advertise internet with local-PRF =150 15- configure R7 to advertise 100.100.100.100/32 with local-PRFof 200 into AS-3
